name: simple-web-cli

scripts.build: rm -rf ./bin ./lib ./.swrc.d.ts ./.swrc.js && npm run lint:fix && rollup -c && tsc;
scripts.patch: npm run update; npm test && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.minor: npm run update; npm test && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.major: npm run update; npm test && npm version major --no-git-tag-version;
scripts.update: pu minor; npm i --ignore-scripts; npm audit fix;

author: https://github.com/wellwelwel
